abstract: Sets the size for controls within this view.

declaration.code: nonisolated func controlSize(_ controlSize: ControlSize) -> some View

overview:
## Discussion

Use `controlSize(_:)` to override the system default size for controls in this view. In this example, a view displays several typical controls at `.mini`, `.small` and `.regular` sizes.

items.description: The size to apply to controls within a view.
items.name: controlSize

items.description: The size classes, like regular or small, that you can apply to controls within a view.
